document_data.name: Hareth Windatamer
document_data.mainbody: '''Hareth Windtamer''' was a [[Tasseldale]] officer in [[Scardale]] in [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Hareth commanded [[Tasseldale garrison (Scardale)|Tasseldale's garrison]] in the city.
document_data.History: Around 1368 DR, without Hareth's knowledge, [[Sembia]]ns bribed all his garrison to work for them.
